questions.title: Another mystery for the tomb raider
questions.description: Lara Croft wants to come to VIT lol, but to enter, she has to solve this: 45 4E 4B 4A 20 49 57 4A 20 45 4F 20 53 57 50 59 44 45 4A 43 20 49 41 (Note : Remember the answer for further parts of this question)

questions.title: Angel of Darkness
questions.description: Lara Croft has successfully entered VIT, but to get past the Red Tag Anna, she has to answer his question. And thus, the Red Tag Anna asks: What's something in common between George Orwell and VIT? (Note : Remember the answer for further parts of this question)
The Red Tag Anna has left Lara Craft alone lol, but to go further, she has to add the digits of the above number, and use it.
questions.hint: Use the number as the key for Caesar Cipher
